summary:
##  Anti-Cheat & Kernel Restore Cleanup

###  Anti-Cheat UI
- added chip to functions that affect anti-cheat of games.

###  Kernel & VBS/HVCI Restore
- Treat missing BCD values as **benign**:
  - `/deletevalue` “Element not found” no longer errors or fails
- VBS/HVCI restore now:
  - Ignores missing hypervisorlaunchtype
  - Falls back only on real failures
  - Logs success if already default
